channel.title: The Odd Bit
channel.description: Recent content on The Odd Bit

item.title: Amateur radio (N1LKS)
item.description: I have an amateur radio Technician class license. My callsign is N1LKS. I am interested in packet radio and other digital modes, although I’m not terribly active on that front. I am the author of the tm-v71-tools package, a CLI tool for managing a Kenwood TM-V71 radio.
item.content:
I have an amateur radio Technician class license. My callsign is N1LKS. I am interested in packet radio and other digital modes, although I’m not terribly active on that front.

I am the author of the tm-v71-tools package, a CLI tool for managing a Kenwood TM-V71 radio.
